name: basic-memory
description: Basic Memory is a minimal self-hosted knowledge base and text snippet vault. It allows users to save, search, and organize information using a clean, markdown-powered web editor, prioritizing speed and privacy.
features: Knowledge Base: Minimal personal knowledge management system. Simple organization.
Text Snippets: Save and organize text snippets and notes. Quick capture.
Markdown Editor: Clean markdown-powered writing interface. Beautiful formatting.
Fast Search: Find information quickly with powerful search. Instant retrieval.
Privacy-First: Self-hosted for complete data privacy. Your knowledge, your control.
Lightweight: Minimal resource usage and fast performance. Efficient design.
Simple Interface: Clean, distraction-free UI. Focus on content.
Desktop App: Native Linux application for optimal performance. Smooth experience.
